europeana:record.dc:title: Kollasmosoma gen. nov. and a key to the genera of the subfamily Neoneurinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Achterberg, van C.
Argaman Q.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Insecta
Braconidae; Neoneurinae; Kollasmosoma; Palaearctic; Mediterranean; key
europeana:record.dc:description: The new genus Kollasmosoma (Braconidae: Neoneurinae; type species: Elasmosoma platamonense Huddleston, 1976, from the Mediterranean area) is described and illustrated. New combinations are: Kollasmosoma cubiceps (Huddleston, 1976), K. marikovskii (Tobias, 1986), and K. platamonense (Huddleston, 1976). A key to the genera of Neoneurinae is added, and the type species of the known genera are illustrated.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Kollasmosoma gen. nov. and a key to the genera of the subfamily Neoneurinae (Hymenoptera: Braconidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 5)
